name: Supporting Character
description: Secondary characters who assist the protagonist and add depth to the story

prompt.base: Supporting character, secondary role, sidekick, ally character, companion, helpful presence, story depth, character development
prompt.positive: supporting character, secondary role, well-developed personality, distinct appearance, memorable traits, helpful ally, loyal companion, unique characteristics, clear motivation, complementary to protagonist, story enrichment
prompt.negative: protagonist focus, main character spotlight, hero emphasis, central role, leading character

variations.name: Mentor Supporting
variations.modifier: wise advisor, experienced guide, teaching role, protective figure, knowledge provider

variations.name: Comic Relief Supporting
variations.modifier: humorous character, lighthearted presence, comedic timing, tension breaker, entertaining personality

variations.name: Loyal Sidekick
variations.modifier: faithful companion, always present, unwavering support, trusted ally, constant presence

examples: A supporting character with distinct personality, helpful ally to protagonist, memorable traits
A loyal companion in supporting role, well-developed character, complementary presence
